author: slehti
body:
HLT Tau validation update for 75X. This update adds legs X from tau+X trigger into validation. The code changes in this PR are the same as in PR #9257, but starting from a new from-branch. The PR #9257 can now be dropped.
Automatically ported from CMSSW_7_5_X #9533 (original by @slehti).
title: Updated HLTTau validation to include legs X in tau+X triggers
